value.title: What's a Junk Dimension and when should you use it?
value.excerpt: Maybe you've heard of the concept of a junk dimension but what exactly is it and when should you use it? Patrick breaks down this dimensional modeling concept.   Junk Dimensions https://www.kimballgroup.com/data-warehouse-business-intelligence-resources/kimball-techniques/dimensional-modeling-techniques/junk-dimension/

value.title: What's the real size of your data model in Power BI?
value.excerpt: From Power BI Desktop, to Task Manager, to different spots in the Power BI service - why are the sizes different? What's going on? How can you tell what the real size is? Well, it depends! Marco Russo joins Patrick to explain.  üì¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************

value.title: Why is there a limited relationship when using the same data source?

value.title: Working with images in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows you how to work with images in Power BI. He isn't talking about adding a logo into your report. This looks at how you can integrate visuals in your visuals based on your data.  LET'S CONNECT!
